entry.title: I'm Scared I'll Never Sleep Again
entry.summary:
Author: idk_words

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,241Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 69

Summary: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm okay, Hen,‚Äù He says, turning to face her.‚ÄúYou look like you haven‚Äôt slept in a week,‚Äù She states.‚ÄúI haven‚Äôt,‚Äù Eddie admits, ‚ÄúI mean, I‚Äôve gotten some naps in at the station and when I helped Buck at his house the other day, but other than that nothing, I just can‚Äôt fall asleep at home anymore.‚Äù‚ÄúWhat do you think has changed?‚Äù Hen asks; she knows what has changed, but she asks anyway.Eddie thinks, ‚ÄúMy bed is just so cold now. I feel like something is missing. I can sleep at Buck‚Äôs, and I can sleep here in the bunks, but for some reason, my bed isn‚Äôt comfortable anymore.‚Äù‚ÄúYou think the bunks are comfortable?‚Äù Hen asks, looking at him in disbelief. She knows they aren‚Äôt, and she‚Äôs trying to push Eddie towards the answer, but he‚Äôs just not getting it.‚ÄúNo, it just feels easier to sleep here than at home for some reason,‚Äù Eddie says, then yawns again.OREddie can't figure out why he can't fall asleep after Buck moves out of his house.

entry.title: What Lies Between Fire and Smoke
entry.summary:
Author: stupidstupidgirl

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,878Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Late at night when the streets of L.A are deafly quiet and the only noise offering solace is the sound of his own breathing, moonlight peeking through closed curtains, Evan Buckley will lay awake, stare at the bare ceiling above him and think. If you had asked him three months ago, before everything, what had him up so late reflecting, he‚Äôd probably go on one of his usual monologues about whatever wikipedia binge he‚Äôd been on hours earlier. However, these recent nights he thinks about his family. The one and only he could ever say he truly had. ¬† Or: Buck navigates his own self insecurities in the wake of The Lawsuit and burgeoning feelings towards a certain coworker.Eddie deals with differentiating between anger, love, and religious trauma.

entry.title: (If) In Ten Years Time
entry.summary:
Author: Breezealongby (HonoraryFigment)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,202Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: In El Paso they were Eddie and Evan, five years old becoming friends forever. Then they were eighteen and forever ended in a blaze of teenage decisions. In LA they are Buck and Dr. Diaz and now there is a decade sitting between now and who they used to be. And Buck is carrying the weight of secret who is turning ten years old.. Or, Shannon finds out she is pregnant, and instead of helping her telling Eddie, his best friend comes up with an entirely different plan.

entry.title: i see trouble (and i want him to come my way)
entry.summary:
Author: neonweeknds

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 165,129Chapters: 18/24Kudos: 65

Summary: Buck was riding the high of his first successful solo debut, still nursing the ache of someone who walked away, when he got news that blindsided him‚Äîhis upcoming solo tour wouldn‚Äôt be so solo after all. He‚Äôd be sharing the stage with Eddie Diaz, a rising country star with a mysterious past and a sound that was quickly blowing up. At first, Buck hated the idea. The last thing he wanted was to split the spotlight he‚Äôd fought so hard for. But then he actually got to know Eddie. The problem? Buck had always blurred the line between friendship and something more‚Äîand with Eddie, it was getting harder to tell the difference. or the pop star evan buckley and country singer eddie diaz slow burn angsty friends to lovers au.

entry.title: Soul of Water
entry.summary:
Author: PaperFirefly

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,207Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 35

Summary: Buck made a friend as a child that would stay with him from that day on. That friend just so happened to be a spirited little water elemental. A promise has kept their bond a secret his entire life, but now that Buck is older, and a very perceptive Eddie Diaz has entered the picture, keeping his secret might not be as easy, or necessary, as he thought. Follow Buck as he learns more about his bond and abilities, all while dragging an unaware Eddie and Chris along for the ride.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,203Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 631

Summary: ‚ÄúChris?‚Äù Eddie asks, turning away from the stove only to see Chris wearing his headphones at the kitchen table. ‚ÄúChris!‚Äù he calls out and waits for Chris to free up an ear. ‚ÄúDid you hear me?‚Äù ‚ÄúSomething about Buck?‚Äù Chris guesses. ‚ÄúWhat is it now?‚Äù Eddie has no idea where this kid gets his sass from. ‚ÄúI wanted your opinion,‚Äù Eddie responds, pointing his spatula at Chris, ‚Äúon whether or not you think Buck might have feelings for me? Because I‚Äôm trying to decide if I should say something to him or not.‚Äù Chris pulls his headphones off fully, placing them on the table. ‚ÄúAbout your big gay crush?‚Äù Chris asks, looking for clarification. Eddie rolls his eyes and nods. ‚ÄúSure, my ‚Äòbig gay crush‚Äô.‚Äù ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know why you don‚Äôt just show him the tattoo,‚Äù Chris replies. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm pretty sure he‚Äôll be able to figure it out from there.‚Äù * (Eddie gets a tattoo of a buck on his thigh.)

entry.title: The Easy (Kill)
entry.summary:
Author: Strawberrywaltz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 127,588Chapters: 22/24Kudos: 1,023

Summary: ‚ÄúI‚Äôll do whatever you want, just, please.‚Äù Buck sobs out the last word, eyes burning with unshed tears. ‚ÄúA vow.‚Äù The man leans uncomfortably close to Buck. The knife brushes against his neck, lightly scratching across the top layer of Buck‚Äôs skin. The man‚Äôs cold blue eyes hold Buck‚Äôs full attention. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs what I require. Sell me your allegiance.‚Äù Buck stares back at the killer, unable to fully process what is being asked of him. He sees a flash of anger dance in the stranger‚Äôs gaze. He's impatient. Unpredictable. Fear pours into Buck's chest as he realizes he might not get a second chance at this. He has to make this count. ‚ÄúI vow to give you complete control over the remainder of my life. My body is yours to destroy‚Äîso long as you let my sister live and return safely to her family.‚Äù __ Or, After Eddie leaves for Texas, Buck goes to seek comfort from his sister and walks in on her kidnapping. In order to save Maddie's life, Buck offers up his instead. Unintentionally agreeing to something worse than death.

entry.title: Unconditional Love
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,186Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Evan is Bobby‚Äôs biological son from a previous marriage; Athena is his stepmother)This story is set six months after a major virus exposure. Eddie has returned home from Texas to help out Chimney, who is temporarily stepping in as captain of the 118 firehouse while the actual captain, Bobby, is in a medically induced coma fighting the virus.During the six months apart, Eddie and Evan grew incredibly close, leading to a secret relationship between them. Evan is struggling significantly with his father's condition, spending almost all his time at the hospital, barely sleeping or eating. Eddie is actively trying to take care of him, even having to drag Evan out of the hospital to rest.

entry.title: The Devil's on the Loose
entry.summary:
Author: audioaujom

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,826Chapters: 8/15Kudos: 79

Summary: In the back of the ambulance, Eddie was in the middle of rechecking vitals for the injured patient when he suddenly heard the sirens stop wailing, immediately jolting up from what he was doing. ‚ÄúWhat the hell‚Ä¶?‚ÄùWhen Eddie looked up he saw the glint off the metal of the gun the guard with him was holding, gaze instantly locking onto the threat. His hands over the patient stilled, and his eyes narrowed into a glare. It was made worse when he recognized the eyes he was glaring into, his anger too strong for his rising panic to bother him at all.‚ÄúHey there, Eddie.‚Äù The man grinned, taking his hat off as the disguise was no longer doing him any good. ‚ÄúMiss me?‚Äù‚Äú...Axel.‚Äù Eddie greeted, teeth clenched so hard he could feel pain in his jaw.Axel just continued to smile, the gesture menacing. ‚Äú‚ÄòCause I certainly missed you.‚ÄùWelcome to LA!Here you'll find a canon-divergent 9-1-1 AU where Buck and Eddie get abducted during the prison riot and have both their situation and their feelings to deal with.This is a direct sequel to I'm Down, Bleeding Out, Begging for the Bell, but reading of it is not required.Updates Thursdays!

entry.title: You Belong With Me
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,866Chapters: 20/20Kudos: 534

Summary: Cat Valentine never thought she had a dad. She has been living with her grandma since she can remember. Her mom left when she was really young. Her grandma always said her parents got pregnant during high school. Evan Buckley never knew his high school girlfriend got pregnant. She picked up and moved one day with her mom, her mom got a job in LA so they left Hersery. When Cat is 14, she finds her birth certificate and learns her father is Evan Buckley. She is determined to meet him. Luckily she still lives in LA, and goes to Hollywood Arts. Buck has just returned back to work after the lawsuit and is on the outs with his family. [You do not need to watch Victorious] You may have noticed I'm having an obsession with extremely RANDOM crossovers ü§∑ü´£ü§£

Author: TheRomanceKing

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 963Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: At a 118 fundraising gala, Eddie is convinced Buck will spend the whole night making small talk and dodging meaningful interaction. Buck is convinced he should keep a safe emotional distance from the one man who always makes him feel too much. A slow song begins, Eddie makes a bold decision and Buck discovers he cannot resist a stolen dance or the kiss that follows.
